analysis.description:
EtherGames.purchase (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2cbca4449adb54ecddb3a65faf204b5e1790c3e.sol#180-223) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- oldOwner.transfer(payment) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2cbca4449adb54ecddb3a65faf204b5e1790c3e.sol#218)

EtherGames._payout (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2cbca4449adb54ecddb3a65faf204b5e1790c3e.sol#369-374) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ceoAddress.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2cbca4449adb54ecddb3a65faf204b5e1790c3e.sol#371-372)
	- _to.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/8/0xd2cbca4449adb54ecddb3a65faf204b5e1790c3e.sol#374)
